lines: 1. Mutufumye no bupalo, Mu mitima yesu pe;
Tube no kutemwa kwenu, Twange no luse lwenu;
Mutukoshe, mutukoshe, Lyonse tuli pano nse.
2. No mucinshi twatotela, Pa fyebo ifisuma;
Cibe cakulya ca myeo, Cikale mu mitima;
Imwe bene, Imwe bene. Muleba ne fwe lyonse.
3. Nshiku shonse shesu Mfumu, Twashipela kuli â€˜mwe;
Tukekala, tukekala, Na Yesu Inshiku pe.
